Class TestStudent

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          java.awt.Window
              java.awt.Frame
                  javax.swing.JFrame
                      proj3.TestStudent
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class TestStudent
extends javax.swing.JFrame

This module tests the student by loading up questions from a database table. A running percentage is displayed to the user, and radio buttons are shown for user choice. The user can click to proceed to the next question, and at the end of the test the user is shown their final score.

Author:
mark
See Also:
Serialized Form

Method Detail

mainInitialization

public void mainInitialization()
Reads the questions from the database connect and stuff them into a temp variable. Initializes the GUI components. Centers the window. Creates a new radio group for the radio buttons. Begins to setup the first question, then displays the frame.

quit

public void quit()
Called when the window is closed. Handles closing of database connection as well. Sets parent window visible before disposing self.

centerWindow

private void centerWindow()
Centers the window on the screen.
